titles.title: Preserve Charitable Giving Act
To amend the National Labor Relations Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/25/2001--Introduced. Preserve Charitable Giving Act - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to allow exceptions for charitable, eleemosynary, or other beneficent purposes from workplace no-solicitation or no-access rules (by providing that such an exception shall not be grounds for finding an unfair labor practice).
